title: Writer Pro v1.1.1
description:
Writer Pro is a professional writing suite that introduces syntax analysis and a simple workflow. Syntax ControlÃ¢â€žÂ¢ scans English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish text, and highlights your adjectives, nouns, verbs, adverbs, prepositions, or conjunctions. On iPhone and iPad, Syntax Control currently works for English text only.

Writer ProÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s simple workflow is built around how you work: Start with your ideas in Note, flesh them out in Write, progress to Edit for refining, then move to Read when youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re done. Rather than a limiting modal interface, these Workflow states act as environments to focus you on the task at hand. A documentÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s state syncs via iCloud across connected devices, and each state has a task-specific font and color.
